body.name: Shark HP132 Clean Sense Air Purifier with Odor Neutralizer Technology, HEPA Filter, 500 sq. ft., Small Room, Bedroom, Office, Captures 99.98% of Particles, Dust, Smoke & Allergens, Portable, White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 42 mins
features: POWERFUL PURIFICATION: Pure Air MicroForce uses a fast, powerful, quiet fan to deliver 4 speeds of purification based on the air quality around you.

EXCEEDS HEPA STANDARDS: Anti-Allergen* NANOSEAL HEPA filter captures more micropollutants than HEPA standards require. Traps 99.98% of large, small, & micro-sized particles (based on EST-RP-CC007.3, 0.1–0.2 microns). *Allergen refers to non-living matter.

FRESH-SMELLING HOME: Odor Neutralizer Technology guards against odors throughout your home, releasing a fresh scent, delivering 2x better odor reduction vs. filtration alone. *Based on ASTM E544 vs. HP100 / HP200 with filter and carbon only, after 30 minutes.

AUTOMATICALLY ADJUSTS: Clean Sense IQ tracks air quality and constantly adjusts power to maintain clean air in your home. (Measures three particle sizes: PM1, PM2.5, and PM10). Results & updates are displayed in real-time on an LED screen.
SMALL ROOM COVERAGE: Cleans up to 500 sq. ft. *Based on AHAM AC-1, at one air change per hour. Perfect for smaller rooms such as bedrooms, laundry rooms, mud rooms, and nurseries.
WORRY-FREE ALLERGEN RELIEF: Protects your home from common air pollutants such as dust, dander, allergens*, and smoke. *Allergen refers to non-living matter.
COMPACT & PORTABLE: Shark's sleek & compact air purifier is just 6 lbs., and can fit on smaller surfaces like nightstands & desktops for portable, powerful cleaning.
FOR A GOOD NIGHT'S SLEEP: Ultra-quiet performance, with dimmable lights for minimal sleep interruption.
EASY TO USE: The control panel is easy to use and displays real-time air quality, filter life, fan speed, Eco mode, and more.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: Shark Clean Sense Air Purifier with Odor Neutralizer Technology & NANOSEAL HEPA Filter.
body.description: The Shark Clean Sense Air Purifier with Odor Neutralizer Technology uses Pure Air MicroForce to deliver fast, powerful, and quiet purification for up to 500 sq. ft. in a compact size. A True HEPA filter captures 99.98% of airborne particles (based on IEST-RP-CC007.3, 0.1-0.2 microns). Odor Neutralizer Technology guards against odors throughout your home and releases a fresh scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite air filter!
reviews.reviewText: I already liked the Shark brand, but these features made me instantly fond of this unit. I can read the pollen count in a room! Pollen! I cannot start to tell you how important this is for me. When I turned on this filter the pollen count was a seven. A seven in a bedroom with the door typically closed. Yikes! The air quality was yellow on the unit and that surprised me too. My only concern is the odor unit that goes on top. I have allergies to many scents and this one is bad. I’m hoping it dissipates or filters out or I’m going to wind up taking that piece off the top. I think it’s supposed to be some sort of linen fresh scent, but I am dreadfully allergic to everything like that. Then again, part of its performance may be that it can filter that out of the air also! The overall performance is nothing short of miraculous, and better than anything else I have used so far! The QR code is important. It goes to the website which leads you to any and every video that’s important about this unit. Briefly watching those gave me the complete rundown on every option on this unit. Bravo! So well done! It’s also a bonus that it can work as a white noise generator because that is also needed for that particular room. G Go ahead and order an extra it sometime this next week because I don’t want to not have this running ever again. Worth more than five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Nursery
reviews.reviewText: This purifier is small but it is a workhorse. We have a lot of smoke int he area, and an exterior door in near our nursery. When the door is open too long the purifier picks up that there is smoke in the air and turns itself up to start cleaning. It is really quiet, but you can hear the fan going on the highest setting. But even then it is quiet compared to my GermGuardian air purifier. Another feature I like is the scent guard that neutralizes odors. You can adjust the strength of it, it does have a slight smell to it when it is being used, a fresh scent but some people might not like the scent it puts off.
